medium: Black chalk, graphite, with a separate pen and gray wash over black chalk, sketch architectrual border, on laid white paper
signed: [Ritratto di Gio. Battista Pittori Veneziano, Origa fatto di sua proprio Mano in Venezia] (Portrait of Giovanni Battista Pittoni Venetian Painter, original made by his own hand in Venice', in pencil, on back of the portrait;   [Ritratto Di Gio Batista Pittoni Pitte Venej Originale di sua mano], in pen, on the back of the architectural frame
title: Self Portrait
